thread.title: Alphabet hides geeky Google-style math joke in stock buyback
thread.title_full: Alphabet hides geeky Google-style math joke in stock buyback

title: Alphabet hides geeky Google-style math joke in stock buyback
text:
Alphabet hides geeky Google-style math joke in stock buyback 
thestar.com Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Of course, this was not a randomly selected number. The square root of 26 (the number of letters in the alphabet) is 5.09901951359. Multiply that by $1 billion and you have the buyback amount. 
...
